process.name: Agile001
process.description: Initial Agile process customization for Kforce projects

fields.name: Requested By
fields.description: Person who requested the change.

fields.name: Business Value Description
fields.description: A short description of the business value this request will add. This should help to elaborate on the value represented in the Business Value field.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: What the user will be able to do when this is implemented

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description or reference to the story that must work for this work to be considered complete

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this user story will be implemented

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: State
fields.description: New = Not started yet; Active = work remains to be done; Resolved = awaiting acceptance tests; Closed = acceptance tests passed

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the story is in its current state

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: Business importance. 1=must fix; 4=unimportant.

fields.name: Risk
fields.description: Uncertainty in requirement or design

fields.name: Stack Rank
fields.description: Work first on items with lower-valued stack rank. Set in triage.

fields.name: Start Date
fields.description: The start date for implementation of this story

fields.name: Finish Date
fields.description: The completion date for all the tasks implementing this story

fields.name: Value Area
fields.description: Business = delivers value to a user or another system; Architectural = work to support other stories or components

fields.name: Integration Build
fields.description: The build in which the bug was fixed

fields.name: Target Date
fields.description: The target date for completing the feature

fields.name: Business Value
fields.description: The business value for the customer when the feature is released

fields.name: Time Criticality
fields.description: How does the business value decay over time. Higher values make the feature more time critical

fields.name: Effort
fields.description: The estimated effort to implement the feature

fields.name: Activity
fields.description: Type of work involved

fields.name: Remaining Work
fields.description: An estimate of the number of units of work remaining to complete this task

fields.name: Original Estimate
fields.description: Initial value for Remaining Work - set once, when work begins

fields.name: Completed Work
fields.description: The number of units of work that have been spent on this task

fields.name: Repro Steps
fields.description: How to see the bug. End by contrasting expected with actual behavior.

fields.name: Severity
fields.description: Assessment of the effect of the bug on the project

fields.name: Found In
fields.description: The build in which the bug was found

fields.name: Application Type
fields.description: The type of application on which to give feedback

fields.name: Application Start Information
fields.description: The path to execute the application

fields.name: Application Launch Instructions
fields.description: Instructions to launch the specified application

fields.name: Rating
fields.description: Overall rating provided as part of feedback response

fields.name: Issue
fields.description: Used to highlight the shared step, e.g., to mark it as an issue

fields.name: Steps
fields.description: Steps required to perform the test

fields.name: Automated Test Name
fields.description: The name of the test that automates this test case

fields.name: Automated Test Storage
fields.description: The assembly containing the test that automates this test case

fields.name: Automated Test Id
fields.description: The ID of the test that automates this test case

fields.name: Automated Test Type
fields.description: The type of the test that automates this test case

fields.name: Test Suite Type
fields.description: Specifies the category of the test suite.

fields.name: Test Suite Audit
fields.description: Captures the test suite audit trail.

fields.name: Due Date
fields.description: The date by which this issue needs to be closed

workItemTypes.name: User Story
workItemTypes.description: Tracks an activity the user will be able to perform with the product

workItemTypes.name: Feature
workItemTypes.description: Tracks a feature that will be released with the product

workItemTypes.name: Task
workItemTypes.description: Tracks work that needs to be done.

workItemTypes.name: Epic
workItemTypes.description: Epics help teams effectively manage and groom their product backlog

workItemTypes.name: Bug
workItemTypes.description: Describes a divergence between required and actual behavior, and tracks the work done to correct the defect and verify the correction.

actions.value: Code complete and unit tests pass
Code complete and unit tests pass

behaviors.description: Enables work items to be ordered relative to other work items
behaviors.name: Ordered
